name: Pokowai Arch - Translucent Matte Grey Frame - Blue Hawaii Polarized Lens

features: Lens: Blue Hawaii - Our blue mirror coating provides a stylish new look that offers the same amazing colour enhancement and clarity as all other Maui Jim lenses.Lens Material: MauiPure - Our most popular lens material. It combines optics almost as crisp as SuperThin Glass with ultra lightweight and excellent scratch and shatter resistance.
Shape: Rectangular frame complements medium faces.
Bridge: Saddle-style bridge with adjustable nose pads for added comfort
Finishing Treatment: Three colour options available in matte and gloss finish.
Material: Lightweight, thin Grilamid frame designed for longer wear time.
